mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sftc_token (create_time, is_logout, gmt_modified, gmt_expiry, local_token, user_id) VALUES (#{create_time}, #{is_logout}, #{gmt_modified}, #{gmt_expiry}, #{local_token}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT u.name, t.access_token FROM sftc_order o, sftc_user u, sftc_token t WHERE u.id = o.sender_user_id AND u.id = t.user_id AND o.id = #{id}
SELECT sftc_user.* FROM sftc_token, sftc_user WHERE sftc_user.id = sftc_token.user_id AND sftc_token.local_token = #{token}
